title: Question 10
prompt:
Sentence 16: Do not remove cloth or material if its stuck to the wound, but make sure the victim is not exposed to smoke, heat, or smoldering materials.

Which is the best way to write the underlined portion of this sentence? If the original is the best way, choose option (A).
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
The word “its” is a possessive form of “it,” meaning “belonging to it.” The correct word for this sentence is “it’s,” a contraction that means “it is.” The meaning of this part of the sentence is “if it is stuck to the wound.”


Do not remove cloth or material if it’s stuck to the wound, but make sure the victim is not exposed to smoke, heat, or smoldering materials.
